snippet: Doug Whaley was promoted and will take over as the Buffalo Bills’ general manager, making the team’s near top-to-bottom off-season overhaul complete.
lead_paragraph: Doug Whaley was promoted and will take over as the Buffalo Bills’ general manager, making the team’s near top-to-bottom off-season overhaul complete.

headline.seo: Bills Promote Doug Whaley to General Manager
headline.main: Bills Promote Whaley to General Manager
